about_the_game:
You have a date to make! But, it looks like you got there too early... Explore a quiet corner of the bustling city by interacting with locals, playing games at the arcade, fishing, and much more. Leave your date waiting, or fail to impress them with your natural charisma, and you'll be left on "read".



However, walk the walk and talk the talk, and you may have just secured yourself a second date!

There are many minigames to find around the city. These include fishing, playing arcade games, hide and seek, and more! The activities you choose to partake in will affect the available topics of conversations with your date. Pay close attention, as your date may have some questions for you regarding these activities.


Whether you are spending the day in the arcade or picking out flowers for your potential lover, time marches on. Spend your time wisely to get the most out of your day. If you miss out on something, there's always Another Day with You, and another chance for love.

short_description: Another Day with You is an adventure game featuring mini-games galore. Explore this quiet corner of the city - time passes as you play, whether you are talking to locals, playing hide and seek, or at the arcade. Will you leave your date waiting? Did you bring flowers? It's Another Day with You.
